text: Number Plate Reading. Make and Model Recogtion. Eye Motion Analysis. EYE FACE SDK. What we offer? Software routines for object detection and object recognition prepared according to customer specification and based on cutting edge research results in machine learning and artificial intelligence. Why choose us? Long-term research and development experience in computer vision, machine learning and artificial intelligence. PRODUCTS: EYE FACE SDK, Based on what we hear from our clients, we believe it can. Face recognition is a complex issue, especially when you combine it with age estimation and gender identification. Whether you need to analyze photos or videos, your best bet is to implement a ready-to-use solution. Like our EyeFace SDK. We are experts when it comes to image recognition. We are obsessed with accuracy, optimization, flexibility and speed. If you need your software to recognize real people, definitely try our EyeFace Demo. Get cutting-edge accuracy without wasting your time. You will find the integration surprisingly easy. Face Detection Our fast algorithms will find all visible human faces in your image or video, even in low resolution. Face Analysis Who are those people? Know their age and gender. Unique person counting Don t count twice. Uniquely recognize people for better person counting. Our EyeFace SDK is a standalone C/C++ library for Windows and Linux environments. The core functions include face detection, face recognition, age & gender recognition, tracking and logging to server. The library is intended for real-time use with video streams. The applications are limitless: targeted advertising, person counting, profiling or entrance systems. MAKE AND MODEL RECOGNITION SOFTWARE FOR STATIC CAMERAS Software analyzes vehicle appearance and recognizes vehicle category, make, model and color. The analysis is independent of number plate reading. EYEDENTITY: FORENSIC SOFTWARE FOR FACE RECOGNITION. HIGHLIGHTS Detection and recognition of faces in photos and video sequences Descriptor invariant to pose, illumination and facial expressions Similarity metric for fast recognition with millions of enrolled individuals Support of vast number of image and video formats Solution targeting all major platforms Eyedea Recognition s Eyedentity is a ready-to-use forensic software for face detection and recognition, based on the results of long-term research in the field of computer vision. The user can manage a database of enrolled individuals, process images and videos acquired in cases and execute face similarity queries using a desktop application. Optimized for both speed and recognition performance, Eyedentity is an ideal solution to the problem of identification and verification based on face images. Our software achieved 2nd place when evaluated by NIST along with top face recognition vendors to provide unbiased comparison to the best of currently existing algorithms. REFERENCES The software is being used by EUROPOL - European Counter Terrorism Centre DCPJ / SDAT Anti-terrorisme, Police Nationale (France) Police of the Czech Republic, Anti‚Äëdrug Unit and Organized Crime Unit. ANONYMIZER: IMAGE DATA ANONYMIZATION Anonymizer software anonymizes images using cutting-edge detection and blurring technology developed by Eyedea Recognition. Software detects faces and car number plates in various scales and orientations and applies blurring filters to make the faces unidentifiable and the number plates unreadable. Avoid problems with GDPR when publishing photos. Face Detection Our fast algorithms will find all visible human faces in your images even in low resolution. Licence Plate Detection Our extremely accurate licence plate detector catch all 1-line and 2-line EU-type licence plates. Smooth & Seamless blurring Eyedea provides smooth and seamless anonymization for visually perfect result. Our Anonymizer SDK is a standalone C/C++ library for Windows and Linux environments. The core functions of library anonymizes image files, JPEG buffers and RGB image buffers. Anonymizer is intended to be used for anonymizing of street-view photos, photos from webcams, user submitted photos or any other photos where you need to protect privacy. Now Anonymizer GUI application for Windows is available for easy image anonymization. Easily configure anonymization parameters and get result preview for free. Software is used by Seznam a.s. to anonymize spherical images for Panorama. Panorama is the street-view like service provided by Seznam a.s. in the Czech Republic. ABOUT US: We focus on developing high-end computer vision solutions. Eyedea Recognition s. r. o. is a research and technology company focusing on developing high-end computer vision solutions, primarily on object detection and object recognition systems based on machine learning and artificial intelligence methods. Eyedea Recognition s. r. o. was established in August 2006 as a university spin-off company at Czech Technical University in Prague. The company was founded by a group of researchers from Centre for Machine Perception, Department of Cybernetics, FEE-CTU. TACR logo Eyedea Recognition s. r. o. is supported by Technology Agency of the Czech Republic, Projects TA02010477 and TE01020415.

One of the fastest-growing behavioral research companies in the world. 95% of consumer decisions are made subconsciously. By only using explicit insights, you are missing out on understanding what drives consumer behavior. EyeSee s unique approach of using remote behavioral and conventional research methods delivers you next-level consumer insights. 53% of clients rank us in the top 10% of research suppliers. We make behavioral data accessible to unlock next-level insights for our clients. Discouraged with the limitations of conventional market research methodologies, and after stumbling upon an eye-tracking study, Olivier Tilleuil realized the enormous potential of behavioral market research. He teamed up with Joris De Bruyne and founded EyeSee. Today, what began in 2012 as four researchers in a small rented space in Belgium, has grown into the fastest-growing behavioral research company in the world, gathering 90+ talents in 5 offices across the globe.  We understand the problems global companies are faced with when making decisions that can have a massive impact on their brands and products.  That s why we believe that:  Market research should re-invent itself: Innovate to understand the world s consumers: go beyond long surveys and focus groups Insights should be accessible: Remote behavioral testing is 2 times faster and cost-effective, enabling testing on a global scale Combining behavioral and conventional methods: Multiple methods ensure the highest predictability Testing in context is the key: We develop cutting-edge shopper and digital environments. Unique approach Behavioral + Conventional methods Fast & cost-effective 2x more accessible Best in class insights Rated top 25% research suppliers by 80% of clients. Advertising insights. Digital insights. Shopper insights. Innovation insights. Leverage state-of-the-art methods. Eye tracking is a unique behavioral research method measuring eye gaze ‚Äì i.e. the positions and movements of the eye, to show us what the consumers are (or are not!) looking at. Our Eye tracking tests are done remotely, which cuts down costs, saves time, and enables us to conduct studies in over 40 countries globally. Remote eye tracking: fast, cost effective and global insights: EyeSee has developed a unique platform using webcam-based eye tracking that is able to measure behavior from respondents  own devices (e.g. computer and webcam). By combining these subconscious methods with conscious (e.g. surveys), we tap into both System 1 and System 2 of consumers  decision-making behaviors.  We provide cutting edge insights about your advertising materials, print and video ads, TVCs, E-commerce solutions, social media ads, POS materials, shelf and pack studies, innovation and many more. Facial coding is a process of measuring emotions through facial expressions in order to reveal an unbiased insight into the emotional engagement and connection of the decision-making process of your consumers. Our Facial coding tests are done remotely, which cuts down costs, saves time, and enables us to conduct studies in over 40 countries globally. Facial coding is 2x better at predicting viral potential of videos than surveys. Virtual shopping simulates real store environments and provides a highly realistic shopping experience to the respondents. Virtual shopping boasts a 0.8 correlation with real purchase behavior, in comparison to surveys, which provide only 0.2. Our Virtual shopping tests are done remotely, which cuts down costs, saves time, and enables us to conduct studies in over 40 countries globally. We provide cutting edge insights on packaging design, shelf studies, planogram, POS displays and many more. Reaction time measurement tells us how quickly information is processed by the consumers and thus, how strong are the subconscious connections between a brand or a product, and a certain attribute or statement. Using RTM ensures 40% higher validity than conventional explicit scale insights. Our RTM tests are done remotely,which cuts down costs, saves time, and enables us to conduct studies in over 40 countries globally. RTM helps us measure overall likability, association and attributes, pack claims/benefits, spontaneous and aided brand/product recall, and truthfulness of answers. We provide cutting edge insights on the implicit attitudes towards your brand and product.Surveys or questionnaires are an explicit measurement relying on System 2 thinking ‚Äì the slow, effortful and conscious opinions the consumers form about your brand or product. It is used alongside implicit methods in order to provide the most comprehensive results. Our surveys are done remotely as a part of the study, which cuts down costs, saves time, and enables us to conduct studies in over 40 countries globally. Test in context with cutting-edge environments: A highly realistic context and a natural experience for the respondents yield more accurate insights and greater predictability.

DRIVER MONITORING AND OCCUPANCY MONITORING POWERED BY COMPUTER VISION AI FOR SAFER AND SMARTER CARS AND FLEETS. Eyesight Technologies develops market-leading Driver and Occupancy Monitoring Systems for the in-car environment. Our proprietary technology uses edge-based Computer Vision and Artificial Intelligence (AI) to create safer and better driving experiences. Dozens of patents and over a decade of research and development stand behind our advanced computer vision solutions. Eyesight Technologies is constantly pushing the boundaries of what intelligent sensing solutions can see and accomplish ‚Äì to make driving a better and safer experience. Our Products: Eyesight Technologies intelligent sensing solutions for the in-car environment include Driver Sense - an advanced driver monitoring system (DMS) which tracks the drivers and their real-time state, Cabin Sense - an occupancy and interior monitoring system (OMS) which tracks the entire in-car environment, and Fleet Sense ‚Äìan aftermarket driver monitoring solution for fleets and telematics system providers. These three solutions have been designed to increase safety and enhance the in-car experience. DRIVER SENSE: Driver Sense is our Driver Monitoring System (DMS), focusing on the driver and her/his state. Driver Sense DMS uses computer vision and artificial intelligence to detect in real-time distracted driving and drowsiness of the driver. Advanced features include recognition of enrolled drivers and detection of actions (such as wearing a seatbelt and holding a cellphone). The embedded software solution is offered to OEMs and Tier1s for pre-installment into their cars and trucks. Our driver monitoring solution can detect the following: Drowsiness, Distraction, Wearing a seatbelt, Enrolled drivers recognition, Holding a phone, Smoking. FLEET SENSE: Fleet Sense is our Driver Monitoring Solution for telematics system providers and fleets. As an aftermarket solution, Fleet Sense was designed to detect driver fatigue, distractions and actions, enabling life-saving alerts in real-time. The solution reports the driver s state (attentive, drowsy, distracted, asleep etc.), their actions (smoking, holding a phone, wearing a seatbelt) and identification of enrolled drivers. Fleet Sense is offered to TSPs as a software solution or software + camera solution. Our aftermarket driver monitoring solution can detect: Fatigue, Distraction, Smoking, Holding a phone, Seatbelt, Driver ID. CABIN SENSE: Cabin Sense is our Occupancy and Interior Monitoring Solution (OMS) for the in-car environment. This solution was designed to enhance passenger safety and the in-cabin experience. Cabin Sense is a software solution, offering an API that can be integrated together with the customer s selected in-cabin camera sensor. Our occupancy and interior monitoring solution can detect: Seat occupancy, Child seat, Seatbelt, Passenger identification, Object detection (such as bags and phones), Age & gender. Our Technology: From day one we focused on creating intelligent sensing solutions for the devices around us. We started our Journey creating computer vision solutions for devices which used simple VGA sensors and had the equivalent CPU performance of a modern coffee maker... With that starting point, we are now able to deliver cutting-edge in-cabin sensing solutions using today s far more superior off-the-shelf cameras and computing power. Our sensing solutions are fully embedded and optimized for lean edge processing, on the device in real-time. Providing high performance even for systems with lean computing requirements and capable of running several neural networks in parallel, locally, on ARM processors. The core of our technology is software based, Driver Sense and Cabin Sense, driver and occupancy monitoring solutions, are offered to OEMs and Tier 1s as a software solution. Eyesight Technologies has camera partners and can recommend a camera supplier in case needed. For Fleet Sense we offer a software + camera solution to be integrated into the telematics system provider s solution and offered as part of their aftermarket telematics offering. Lean Edge Processing: The embedded nature of Eyesight Technologies  computer vision AI entails optimization for lean processing requirements, as well as the flexibility to integrate the solution in various environments from basic ARM CPU based systems to advanced NPUs. Partner and customer focused: We have streamlined the evaluation and integration process with our customers in mind; we provide system training and integration support, both on-site and remote. An evaluation kit is available for easy testing of our systems. In-cabin camera position optimization is offered per car model as well as camera module assessment when using customer s/3rd party sensor. SoC/HW acceleration porting is available (if required) and more. Our ecosystem & experience: Over a decade of research and development stand behind the company s market-leading computer vision AI technology, with 30 granted patents and many more pending. Our customers and partners include leading Tier 1 providers, OEMs, chipset companies and automotive camera makers. We have developed a strong ecosystem to support various in-cabin sensing solutions. Privacy: Eyesight Technologies  embedded sensing solutions are fully private and secure. Our solutions analyze the video stream in real-time, translating it to metadata, and then discarding it immediately. No images are stored, recorded, or sent from the device. OUR EMBEDDED COMPUTER VISION TECHNOLOGY IS AVAILABLE FOR THE FOLLOWING MARKETS: Driver Sense & Cabine Sense, Viewer Sense, Device Sense. AUTOMOTIVE SOLUTIONS: DELIVERING SAFER AND BETTER DRIVING EXPERIENCES USING COMPUTER VISION & AI. Eyesight Technologies developed a suite of market leading sensing solutions for the in-car environment: Driver Sense - driver monitoring system (DMS), Cabin Sense - interior and occupancy monitoring system (OMS) and Fleet Sense - an aftermarket driver monitoring solution for fleets. The proprietary technology behind these solutions utilizes computer vision, deep learning and AI to enhance the driving experience. The software solutions are lean and edge-based yet were designed to provide complex in-cabin data while complying with strict automotive standards and requirements. These in-car sensing solutions allow our customers to optimize safety systems to the driver and passengers present, and personalize the in-cabin experience according to demographics and identification. Eyesight s ViewerSense brings edge-based, fully secure and private, computer vision & AI to broadcasting and audience measurement industries. The sensing technology provides real-time viewer analytic data, enabling insights which previously were not available. Eyesight s real-time data revolutionizes the media measurement industry by providing accurate viewership information, opening new revenue streams for the various industry segments (content providers, advertising and more). ViewerSense edge-based software solution provides viewership data in a fully secure and private manner, as all processing is done cloud-free, locally, on-device. No images or videos are stored. Eyesight s DeviceSense is an edge-based computer vision solution which enables interactions with a range of consumer electronic devices using touch-free hand gestures. DeviceSense is a software solution, it is based on years of R&D and offers state-of-the-art tracking and detection of the hand and finger. DeviceSense augments the existing interface of the device by adding computer vision based interaction capabilities to the existing ones. The technology is available for smart speakers, PCs, TVs, Set-Top-Boxes, tablets, among other devices. It uses the devices existing camera or a standard CMOS sensor to deliver it s advance sensing capabilities.DeviceSense was designed to complement other interaction modalities such as voice control, touch, keys and mouse, to allow a natural choice for the best control to be used in accordance to the user scenario and preference. ABOUT US: Eyesight Technologies is a leader in computer vision AI for driver and cabin sensing. Our mission is to make cars better understand, cater to and predict people s needs by leveraging the power of embedded computer vision AI. Eyesight Technologies has over a decade of experience in developing embedded computer vision solutions, and its offerings have been integrated into millions of devices worldwide. The company holds dozens of Patents in the field of computer vision AI and many more pending.With Eyesight Technologies the in-car environment enjoys an added layer of intelligence, delivering safer and enhanced driving and riding experiences. The Team: Eyesight Technologies is led by a team of highly experienced image processing and AI experts that bring together extensive expertise in research, implementation, and optimization of algorithms for embedded platforms and the in-car automotive industry. The Company is headquartered in Israel, with global offices in Cupertino and Shenzhen.

text: FacePhi goes public on Euronext Growth. FacePhi, global leaders in the banking sector. Really happy clients recommending our products around the world. InPhinite, combined biometric solution to make your life easier. Incredible user experience that makes us preferable. Sponsors & speakers without limits. What is InPhinite? A combination of biometric and other security systems that creates a complete digital onboarding and identity authentication solution that allows to access, verify and operate different services and products in mobile and web applications. inPhinite: The most complete solution for digital onboarding, authentication and security formed by different biometrics and antifraud systems of FacePhi, offered with the best user experience in the market. How it works? A combination of biometric and other security systems that creates a complete digital onboarding and identity authentication solution that allows to access, verify and operate different services and products in mobile and web applications. A framework with an easy integration that allows our client to choose which components to activate providing a better and seamless experience for the end user. Composed by Selphi: Facial biometric solution that allows account access or transactions approval with a selfie. PhiVox: Voiceprint biometric solution to access or authenticate yourself in a call center. SelphID: Safe digital onboarding solution with the best real time OCR in the market with facial liveness test. Look&Phi: Solution that uses eye biometric to grant access or approve transactions with a look. SignPhi: The most advanced and flexible Electronic Signature Suite in Cloud, multi-device and multi-signer, adapts perfectly to any type of business. USE CASE OF OUR TECHNOLOGY: Digital Onboarding - New account or credit card applications (Mobile digital onboarding) - Hire a product (account, insurance, loans, etc.) digitally - Credit card or new accounts opening in a kiosc or ATM - Open an account or product from a chatbot, Facebook or Whatsapp. Facial authentication on mobile - Login sessions in mobile and web banking applications - Make a transaction only with your face, forget about pin, token and other mechanisms - Operate in ATM only with your face without the need of a card or PIN. Voice authentication on mobile - Authentication in call centers (interactive voice response) - Approve transactions with your voice authentication, such as: account balances, reset passwords, transfers and any service - Authentication system in mobile or web applications. Fingerprint authentication on mobile against the Government Services - Login sessions in mobile banking applications - Beginning of session in the bank s private account (through the web with QR) - Validate your fingerprints against government services by taking a photo of your fingers. Transaction approval with recognition of electronic signature - Incorporation in mobile banking and web applications - Signature of documents (with mobile application) - Online purchases/online shopping - Only with the user or client signature, the pattern can be extracted and sent to the bank where the user is a client to complete the process. Transaction approval with the look (movement) - Login bank s app (mobile) - Login bank s private account (through web with QR) - Only with the movement of the look towards the indicated side, the technology recognizes the user and approves the transaction without the need for any other security system. Join over 10M users worldwide already using FacePhi. Imaging the possibility to forget using passwords and, at the same time, increasing the level of security for your identity in a friendly way, FacePhi presents inPhinite. How does it work? Biometrics Biometrics is a science that, through automated methods, is able to verify or recognize the identity of a person based on their physiology or behavioral. The concept "biometrics" comes from the words, bios (life) and metron (measure), which means that all biometrical devices can measure and identify personal features. Each person has morphological features that are unique and therefore, different from everyone else. Face recognition allows us to determine the identity of a person by analysing the face. Unlike other types of biometry like iris or fingerprint, face recognition is non-intrusive; it does not require cooperation from the user. It just needs to capture the face of the person with a web cam. Enrollment The registration process begins by filling a registration form. This form allows the administrator to enroll users by entering their personal information and then, by starting the extraction process of their facial features which will configure the users  face pattern. The enrollment can be done with a username, ID number, pin number or card. In every case, the registry is done the same way. The only difference is when a user registers with a card, because it is necessary to first insert the card where the ID of that user is saved. Verification The verification / authentication process consists in comparing (1:1) the biometric features of two entities. The system verifies whether a user actually is who he/she claims to be. In order to do so, the system needs to know the identity of the user prior to the authentication process. There are two ways of introducing the user ID: through a card or typing manually the ID numbers, pin or name. Identification The identification process consists of carrying out a comparison (1:N) of biometric features. The system determines the identity of the user. For it, the extracted face pattern is compared against the systems  database of registered users. If the comparison result is correct, the system will highlight the user whose pattern, stored in the database, matches the most to the pattern obtained in the extraction process. +10 MUSERS +850 MAUTHENTICATIONS +40 CLIENTS. Invest in facial biometrics Over the last years, facial recognition has become a highly active investigation field, and has positioned itself as one of the technologies with higher growth potential (mainly due to its non intrusive nature and the limited cooperation required from the user). FACEPHI is a global leader in Facial Recognition technology and in Mobile Biometrics technologies. With a strong concentration in the financial sector, our product is rapidly becoming a service used by banks all over the world. Its implementation doesn t just save money, it is also a way to attract clients and build loyalty, while increasing the security of transactions for both the customer and the business. This innovative technology enhances the client experience effortlessly by simply using the camera on their mobile device to take a selfie; this then becomes their method of identification and interaction with the bank s mobile application. With the rest of FacePhi s products and its inPhinite solution, banks and financial institutions will satisfied all user s needs without any extra investment in just one implementation and in the easiest and most secure way; the user will be the key for everything imaginable. FacePhi has entirely designed and developed its own robust algorithm, and thanks to the user experience and the extra services that offers as well as the support and maintenance, we have closed the year with more than 40 contracts signed with different banks around the world, +6M of onboardings and +850M of authentications, with +10M of users. An absolute success in the adoption of the facial recognition to login to their private accounts in one year with the 90% of the users and 0% of fraud in all the clients in production. FacePhi is a company with no limits, striving to make others have a better life. Mission: Our mission is to develop biometrics technologies always looking for its improvement and excellence, in order to have state-of-the-art algorithms. We know the importance of investing in R&D to grant the evolution of biometrics. Vision: Being market-leader providers of biometrics technologies, offering it to integrators that will develop final solutions or applications to the end client and this way, extend the use of biometrics to multiple areas such as banking, private corporations or governmental institutions. Values: Integrity Passion for technology Innovation Professionality Dedication. Corporate Social Responsability: FacePhi includes the Corporate Social Responsability as part of its identity starting up an own commitment plan which devotes part of its time making activities in order to improve our lives and our world. Donation 1.6% of benefits donated FacePhi donates 1.6% of its annual net benefits to non-profit organizations in order to raise awareness among its workers and people surrounding the company, of the need to transform society by supporting the needy. Volunteering 76 8 hours per year dedicated to social assistance, per worker The company s workers are free to choose a cause to devote 1.6 hours a week of their working time. So far, our workers have helped associations such as Asoka, Aspanion or Yecla Association of Cancer Affected. Innovation 1.6% of the annual R+D+I budget FacePhi dedicates 1.6% of the annual R + D + I budget to promote and organize activities, talks or conferences where we share our KnowHow, returning part of our knowledge in innovation to society.

Picture intelligence. Identifying high-risk individuals, a major and complex challenge in an ever-changing environment. Twenty years after the launch of the first biographical databases, Facepoint offers breakthrough innovation by taking advantage of enhancements in biometrics and AI. Facepoint proposes the combination of  two powerful tools: an exclusive photographic database of high-risk individuals as defined by international regulatory standards, and state-of-the-art biometrical technology. After two years of research and development, convincing results from Top Tier Banks has enabled Facepoint to launch its concept of  "No Name Screening". Verifications are now done using images, leaving behind the old problems of alphanumeric checks, such as transliterations or DOB relevancy. Today, Facepoint offers the compliance community solutions of the future. In the context of KYC screening processes, Facepoint publishes a worldwide image bank on "people of interest", and offers a "live de-risking" solution thanks to cutting-edge image analysis. The breakthrough solution developed by Facepoint consists in replacing text with image, in order to disambiguate traditional text-based identification and massively reduce false positive rates." Content collected by Facepoint s analysts allows for a near real-time identification and de-risking of emerging threats which remain out of reach of traditional watchlists. A quicker identification process of high-risk individuals accelerates and therefore secures customers  onboarding. Facial images are highly specific. Coupled with facial recognition technology, they drastically reduce false alarm rates and consequently tedious and costly human-performed verifications. FACEPOINT was created in Paris in 2017 and is managed by 4 seasoned Compliance & Data professionals, employing 70 KYC experts.

facetec: anchoring identity. SAY GOODBYE TO: Spoofing, Fraud, Phishing, Friction, ID Theft, Bots, Breaches, Imposters. Passwords. TRUSTED TO PROTECT OVER 1,000,000 NEW USER ACCOUNTS EVERY MONTH. ZoOm¬Æ 3D LIVENESS & FACE AUTHENTICATION SOFTWARE. iBeta / NIST Certified Anti-Spoofing ‚Äì Levels 1&2 World s Best Face Matcher: 1/4,200,000 FAR @ <1% FRR. Universal Liveness, ID Matching & Age Estimation for +10 Billion Smart Devices & Webcams. Ends Identity Theft. UnSharable, UnPhishable & Virtually Spoof-Proof. Patented ZoOm-in User Experience Creates a 3D FaceMap with a Video - Selfie. FaceTec Anchors Digital Identity Certified Liveness For KYC Onboarding + 3D Face Matching for Ongoing Authentication. VERIFIES LIVENESS, 3-D, IDENTITY. ZoOm proves the Correct User is physically present by Matching them to their Photo ID or 3D FaceMap. Frictionless Security For Real Users The intuitive ZoOm interface makes Certified Liveness Detection and 3D Face Matching fast, easy and incredibly secure for everyone, regardless of their device.  During onboarding, ZoOm s 2 second video-selfie verifies Liveness, matches your 3D FaceMap to your Photo ID, and sets up your new account.  Each time you return, ZoOm s ongoing authentication again proves Liveness and compares your new 3D FaceMap to the one enrolled.  If they match, you get instant access, no password required! Brick Wall for Bad Actors Login from any smartphone, tablet, PC or Laptop, and unlock everything from your car door to your bank account.  Real users gain access easily, but bad actors, bots and hackers are rebuffed by Level 1&2 Anti-Spoofing Certified by NIST/iBeta.  ZoOm is the Face Authentication market leader and provides more security, portability, and convenience than any other biometric. FOR ALL MODERN SMART DEVICES & WEBCAMS. CERTIFIED LIVENESS DETECTION IN 2 SECONDS. WORKS IN REAL-WORLD LIGHTING CONDITIONS. GREAT WITH GLASSES, MAKEUP & BEARDS. Certified Liveness + 3D Face Matching. SECURITY CERTIFIED  1 IN THE WORLD. Can a Selfie Really Provide Security? Obviously selfies are easy to take; the real question is if they can provide effective access security. Typically they can t, but ZoOm s patented process isn t just a selfie; it s a face scan that provides a 3D FaceMap and a Certified Liveness Check to ensure the user is physically present, and prevent masks, dolls, photos, or video deepfakes from fooling the system. The Liveness Detection algorithms must observe so many concurrent human traits that spoof artifacts can t recreate them all at once.  ZoOm s 3D Face Matching then compares the user to their previously-enrolled 3D FaceMap, and if the two FaceMaps highly match (1/4.2M+ FAR), the verified user is granted access. No Liveness Data = No Honeypot Risk Two types of data are required for every face authentication: Face Data (for matching) and Liveness Data (to prove the Face Data was collected from a live person).  Liveness Data must be timestamped, be valid only for a few minutes, and then deleted.  New Liveness Data must be collected for every authentication attempt. Face photos are just "Face Data" without any corresponding Liveness Data, so they cannot be used to spoof Certified Liveness Detection, and thus, storing photos does not create honeypot risk.  Think of the stored Face Data as the lock, the User s newly collected Face Data as a One-Time-Use key, and the Liveness Data as proof that key has never been used in the lock before. ZoOm s Encrypted 3D FaceMaps: Can t Be Phished From Users Aren t a Biometric Honeypot Stop Credential Sharing Stop Botnet Attacks Match 1:1 & 1:N at a 1/4.2M FAR Match Highly to a Photo ID Provide Anonymous Age Estimates. HOW ZoOm WORKS: During the ZoOm motion, the camera s view of the 3D face changes, observing perspective distortion and proving it is 3D. In under 2 seconds, ZoOm processes 30+ video frames and reverse engineers a 3D FaceMap from the standard 2D camera. CERTIFIED LIVENESS DETECTION: Over the last five years, we dove more deeply into anti-spoofing than anyone ‚Äì ever.  We have performed hundreds-of-millions of spoof attempts with every conceivable type of media and learned how to stop them. Attack Vectors include: 2D paper photos & digital images High resolution videos Image swap-in after liveness check Paper masks with eye & mouth cutouts Hollywood masks, wax figures & lifelike dolls Photos or video frames animated into avatars Video projections on 3D heads Sleeping users with closed eyes Impostors, lookalikes & doppelgangers. Passing the rigorous iBeta Level 1 & 2 tests prove ZoOm is an unsharable, unphishable biometric that is virtually impossible for criminals to spoof using today s media technology. BIOMETRIC BEST PRACTICES: Demand Certified 3D Liveness Detection.  Without it, you cannot trust unsupervised authentications and will be put at risk by "Suprema" type biometric data breaches.  With Certified Liveness, data breaches can t be leveraged against your users. Delete Liveness Data after each login and collect new Liveness Data for every new session.  This prevents biometric honeypots and allows for safe, centralized biometric storage. Centralized Biometric storage with Server-Side 3D Face Matching is the only way to truly replace passwords, enable cross-platform logins, simplify device upgrades, and allow multiple devices/users. Choose a diverse algorithm.  Don t be accused of having a "biased" biometric just because the training sets used to create it were too homogeneous.  ZoOm trained with users from over 170 countries. Certified Liveness + 3D Face Matching. 2D Face Recognition will never provide the accuracy needed for Face Authentication.  There is too much variability and overlapping similarity in human faces to achieve a high enough FAR (False Accept Rate) when they are flattened from 3D to 2D.  Apple s 3D Face ID uses a special hardware sensor that unlocks one specific phone, but cannot be used on any other devices. FaceTec is proud to highlight some of the organizations providing our class-leading biometric security. DEVELOPERS: USE THE BEST BIOMETRIC: In under 15 minutes you can add ZoOm to your App with a FREE ZoOm Developer Account. ZoOm PRICING: ZoOm via FaceTec Managed API is free for educational use and to developers.  Enterprises, businesses and those who wish to host the ZoOm Server SDK on their Cloud/Server are billed monthly based on usage. ZoOm via Managed API is Free for: Educational Not-For-Profits Developers ZoOm is Billed Per User or Per Session for: Large & small businesses Enterprise accounts Government agencies. ABOUT FACETEC: Founded in 2013, FaceTec is the world leader in 3D Face Authentication software with offices in San Diego, CA, Summerlin, NV, and with Partners globally.

TRANSFORM PHOTOS INTO INSIGHTS. Facetrom is a breakthrough, cross-platform technology that, from a single facial photograph, can analyse a person s biometric facial features to build accurate and detailed profiles about them. CHANGE THE WAY YOU WORK, PLAY & DO BUSINESS‚Äã. HOW IT WORKS. THE FUTURE IS PERSONALIZATION. Everyone is different and each person is unique in their own way. Our facial features appear based on human DNA and researchers have identified countless ways that we judge people based on their looks. These judgments are, however, highly inaccurate as we have many biases. Till now, personalization has been limited, based on demographic data, generalizations, browser behavior, and even A/B testing. Facetrom s special AI makes personalization truly exist. Imagine being able to build accurate profiles of people based on their biometric facial features and to then personalize services that match these profiles. THE FUTURE IS FACETROM. Facetrom is the first personalization tool that s based on a user s objective date: their face. Now you can build 89% personalized profiles in real time, just from a facial photo. Facetrom SPS (Super Personalization System) uses cutting-edge AI, based on biological parameters and visual appearance in order to tailor and personalize per individual, like never before. THE FACETROM PARADIGM SHIFT. Facetrom is a breakthrough technology that is resulting in a fundamental paradigm shift in the digital world, marketing, professional and personal relationships and so much more. Facetrom is a cross-platform technology that, from a single facial photograph, can analyze a person s biometric facial features and build accurate and detailed profiles. The potential uses for Facetrom are limitless; from developing individual marketing messages on a user level, to finding the perfect partner or hiring the right person for a job. FACETROM IS A BREAKTHROUGH, CROSS-PLATFORM TECHNOLOGY THAT BUILDS A PERSON S PROFILE FROM A SINGLE FACIAL IMAGE. OUR STORY. Facetrom was founded by a team determined to unlock the code of the hidden information behind human facial features and biology. Learn more about this multi-disciplinary team and the technology that will change the world. OUR TECHNOLOGY. Facetrom technology brings a whole new dimension to personalization with Facetrom SPS (Super Personalization System). This cutting-edge technology translates any facial photograph into a detailed profile of the person. OUR SOLUTIONS. Take your business to another level with Facetrom SPS Solutions. These cutting-edge solutions will transform the way you view personalization and help you drive up sales, retention, ROI and more.

Award-winning, gold standard facial motion capture solutions. We believe the best facial animation comes from the combination of cutting-edge technology and an intuitive artist-friendly workflow. Used by the Best. Faceware is the most innovative and experienced facial motion capture technology provider in the world. text: CONNECTING ‚ÄãIDENTITIES Filmetrics Corporation is your trusted technology partner that brings together biometrics, mobile systems and data analytics to produce secure business solutions for all your work units anytime, anywhere.‚Äã OUR EXPERTISE Filmetrics Corporation offers a comprehensive range of identity management  solutions that can be integrated with mobile devices and business analytics to create sound and effective systems for varying business needs. Advancing your identity management solutions: prevent identity theft, secure your information and more. IDENT Pro helps businesses streamline identity-dependent processes by boosting certainty in the identification of people through reliable BIOMETRIC IDENTITY MANAGEMENT SOLUTIONS. Professional services. Onboarding: fingerprint & facial image capture. Members verification: confirm accuracy of member details. Proof of life: verification of liveness. Access control: manage physical access rights, privileges & movements between zones. Best fit solution: IDENT Pro evaluates, designs & implements fit-for-purpose solutions. Identity solutions provider for: healthcare, border control, law enforcement, human resources, defense & intelligence, telecommunications services, bank & financial industries. ASSET MANAGEMENT Inventory and As‚Äãset Tracking Workflow Management Warehouse Management Track and Trace SECURITY Secured ID Verification Identity Management Site and Data Access Control Workflow Management Employee Tracking and Monitoring PRODUCTIVITY Employee Performance Management Workflow Process Monitoring Membership Access Control & Monitoring Cashless Financial System. MULTI-FACTOR TECHNOLOGIES. BIOMETRICS Retina Scanner Fingerprint Scanner Facial Biometrics‚Äã ‚ÄãVoice Recognition Picture ASSET TRACKING Satellite GPS Asset Tracking‚Äã Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) Barcode Tracking ‚ÄãNear-Field Communication ‚Äã ‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãIndoor Asset Tracking Picture SECURITY MARKINGS Barcode QR Code Guilloche Holograms ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚ÄãLaser Engravings ‚ÄãUV Inks. OUR REACH Filmetrics is deployed in over 500 locations in the Philippines to service the needs of its clients. It also provides support for its system users around the world OUR TRACK RECORD Biometric Data Service Facilities compliant with NIST, ICAO & UMID Standards Reliable and comprehensive support service from Project Management, Application Development, Technical Support, Helpdesk, Data Transmission, Logistics, Operational Support, Training, Quality Control, Mobile Enrollment and Marketing Onsite Mobile Capture Availability Processes 11,000+ Filipinos everyday 500+ Workstations nationwide 10M+ Annual Biometric Enrollment capacity. ABOUT US. Philippine-based, IT enterprise Filmetrics Corporation is your trusted technology partner that brings together biometrics, mobile systems and data analytics to produce secure business solutions for all your work units anytime, anywhere. With the goal of assisting businesses make smart and sound decisions and fully utilize the potential of their data and digital assets securely and effectively, the corporation authenticates identity and transactions, and ensures the reliability of data in IT systems. Filmetrics  core expertise is in the integration of biometric data from iris, fingerprint and facial characteristics to create usable and functional solutions and systems in businesses and organizations. It also develops asset and identity management systems including PVC Cards, Encrypted Quick-Response Code (QR Code), Radio Frequency Identification (RFID) and more. The corporation takes pride in its track record of large nationwide projects and long-term customers including the biggest Philippine pension fund and the country s postal service, as well as private sector-managed infrastructure and construction projects. Having a multi-disciplined management team with substantial involvement in almost every major industry greatly factors the corporation s ability to deliver effective and holistic business solutions. It provides top quality identity management technologies that comply with international standards that ultimately exceed clients  needs and goals. Furthermore, to ensure seamless and effective project implementation, Filmetrics also conducts system trainings for the clients  staff, provides staff to assist the operation flow of the system and support services. It offers technical support, IT security audit, mobile support, as well as manpower services. ‚ÄãFilmetrics Corporation s unwavering dedication to explore the potentials of technology when it comes to the protection and utilization of digital assets truly makes it the premier identity management solution that helps its partner-companies realize their business goals. CORPORATE BACKGROUND. Filmetrics Corporation was incorporated in 2009, and has since forged a name of its own as a Philippine-based technology-driven enterprise providing premier identity management solutions, best practice insights and business intelligence to different organizations nationwide. Filmetrics serves as the Information Technology branch in the Freyfil Group of Companies. Its sister companies specialize on Construction, Geodetic Investigation, Mining and Aggregates, Engineering Consulting, Surveying and Mapping, Maritime Transportation and Real Estate. In September 2009, it entered into a joint venture with the Philippine Postal Corporation (PHLPost) to create a biometric data service facility that eventually paved the way for the partnership to provide a biometric identification and registration system to the Philippine s largest pension and retirement fund, the Social Security System. In 2010, this collaborative effort with SSS yielded a home-grown and cost effective, fully outsourced biometric enrollment service module that enabled SSS to become the first fully compliant government financial institution under the Unified Membership Identification (UMID) standards set by the Philippine government. Another milestone for the company is the five-year extension of the service contract to 2020, a testament to how Filmetrics is able to consistently deliver exceptional service and satisfy its clients  demands and expectations. In its vision to establish safe and secure digital bridges for everyone, Filmetrics, together with PHLPost, also launched in November 2014 a more secure and verifiable Postal ID card that gave millions of Filipinos better access to a government-issued ID that does not require any special skills, employment or professional license. By providing end-to-end service to PHLPost‚Äîi.e. supplying manpower nationwide highly trained to digitally capture biometric data of applicants; seamlessly transferring harvested data to a centralized facility for safekeeping; analyzing and cross-matching fingerprint data against the database of fingerprints called the Automated Fingerprint Identification System (AFIS); and producing the card infused with multi-layer security features, including but not limited to QR code, hologram and UV ink‚ÄîFilmetrics gives all cardholders and end users with an ID that fully guarantees a person s identity and combats any fraudulent transactions. Furthermore, Filmetrics has also established a partnership with the Department of Social Welfare and Development (DSWD) with regard to mobile payout enrollment and tracking solution for limited mobility clients, with the Association of Carriers and Equipment Lessors, Inc. (ACEL) in developing secure identification and verification systems for training centers, and with the Halili-Cruz School of Ballet in line with mobile access control and identification systems. Today, Filmetrics prides itself in its capacity to adapt to growing innovation demand, and successfully serve its clients across a wide selection of industries. Built on trust and technical expertise, Filmetrics continues to expand and lead different projects with other various government agencies, as well as private sector-managed infrastructures, including schools, certification bodies, and other institutions. ‚ÄãHeadquartered in Quezon City, it has deployed workforce in over 400 locations nationwide as well as workstations in 14 foreign offices outside the country. It has a dedicated training unit and in-house learning facility that produce highly skilled and qualified technical personnel, and ensure delivery of complete, secure and effective platforms aimed at supporting its clients  goals and overall strategic direction. MISSION: To be the premiere identity management solutions partner trusted by enterprises and public agencies in the Philippines To integrate and implement best-of-breed biometric and human interface technologies that comply with international standards to exceed our client s needs To provide reliable and cost-effective outsourced services to enable our clients to focus on their core business priorities To continually build long-term, mutually beneficial relationships with key innovative solution partners‚Äã To continuously seek innovative new technologies that can be used by the Filipino people by empowering our employees to be effective, competent and inspired. VISION: Be the leader in developing innovations in Safe and Secure identity management solutions that will provide improved and faster access to services of private and public institutions for the Philippines.

text: Better information, better decisions, better outcomes. The next-generation platform that combines our groundbreaking search technology with advanced analytics and the most powerful data network. At Forensic Logic, our mission is to deliver the right information so you can make the right decision, every time. WHO IS IT FOR? Law Enforcement Professionals. Crime Analytics Platform. Law Enforcement Search Engine. Forensic Logic Coplink. Patrol Officers: Access critical information on any web-enabled device to improve officer and community safety. Analysts: Identify high concentrations of crime to help prioritize resources and reduce criminal activity. Investigators: Glean actionable insights, in real-time, that help identify crime trends and prevent criminal activity. Command Staff: Develop data-driven dashboards and criminal analysis to improve operational effectiveness and the safety of your officers. COPLINK X deploys the most comprehensive set of data in the industry, allowing agencies to access critical and relevant information from not only your agency s IT systems, but across the city, county, state, and country. Analytics and visualization tools enable patrol, analysts, investigators and command staff to glean actionable insights in real-time that help identify crime trends to deploy resources effectively and reduce crime. ADVANCED SEARCH: COPLINK X is the industry s leading search engine for law enforcement, combining the simplicity of unstructured natural language search with the power of structured field level and federated search. By utilizing machine learning to augment your searches, COPLINK X provides a holistic picture of all your data by exposing information that may only exist in narratives or attachments. The result is that the information you are looking for will appear on the 1st page of results with the same ease as a Google search. THE POWER OF THE NETWORK: There is plenty of law enforcement data available to agencies across the United States. With COPLINK X, we focus on providing the right data. With the most comprehensive set of data in the industry, we offer the singular ability to access critical and meaningful information from not only your agency s IT systems, but across the city, county, state and country. FLEXIBLE DATA RESTRICTION RULES: We have expanded our previous security model of "white, gray, black" visibility within access control groups. Now, extra dimensions such as "system use reason" can be used to control fine-grain data access. HIGHEST SECURITY STANDARDS: Fully CJIS compliant, all agency data is stored in the secure cloud and harmonizes with every other system on the platform. POWERFUL ANALYTICS: Advanced analytics and visualizations provide the ability to centralize and apply complex analytics across multiple data sets. With this information, Law Enforcement analysts and investigators glean actionable insights, in real-time, that help identify crime trends and prevent criminal activity. SIMPLE & ACCESSIBLE: Getting the right information to officers in the field is crucial for enhanced officer safety. COPLINK X is accessible from any centrally managed device and across all compliant networks. A seamless integration with your existing infrastructure puts the power directly into the hands of all law enforcement professionals, including patrol, investigators, analysts and command staff. LEAP Search is a secure, cloud-based information portal deployed as a law enforcement search engine. Its Google-like search interface optimizes search terms and results scoring, so you can simplify data gathering across your entire agency. INTUITIVE & POWERFUL SEARCH: Google- like search interface optimizes search terms and results scoring so that users can quickly and efficiently obtain critical investigative information on any web-enabled device. BILLIONS OF DOCUMENTS & OBJECTS: Expand your search nationwide by joining the largest network of law enforcement agencies in America. Access a wide range of data (court data, evidence and lab data, NIBIN shell casing reports, mugshots, probation and parole information, stop data, tip lines, warrants, daily bulletins, BOLOs and vehicular data, CrimeDex alerts and more). ACCESS CRITICAL INFORMATION: By expanding your law enforcement database, the software helps law enforcement personnel develop crime analysis that apprehends criminals, disrupts criminal organizations, identify crime trends and prevent criminal activity. ACTIONABLE CRIME ANALYTICS: Leverage one-click link charting, timeline, hotspot and geospatial analysis in your search results . From millions of annual searches, the platform "learns" to better understand what a user is looking for, and the result is a system that allows police to glean insights on criminal activity with ease and efficiency. COPLINK¬Æ PROGRAM: A data sharing and crime analytics platform designed to help law enforcement accelerate investigations. DOMAIN-WIDE INFORMATION SHARING. DATA CONSOLIDATION. BILLIONS OF DOCUMENTS AND OBJECTS. CUSTOMIZABLE PLATFORM. Firearm Crimes. Officer Safety. Police Footprint. Drug-related Crimes. Most Advanced Search & Analysis Technology in the Industry. A New Technology, A New Kind of Policing. ABOUT: Headquartered in San Francisco CA, Forensic Logic COPLINK deploys the largest, most powerful network of users, information, and technology in American law enforcement. Powered by the most advanced search and analysis technology in the industry, our mission is to give our users the information they need to keep themselves and their communities safe. OUR STORY: Over half of violent crimes and 80% of property crimes go unsolved each year. The information that can solve and prevent these crimes exists, but it is too frequently locked away in legacy IT systems in the 18,000 law enforcement agencies in the United States. After September 11th, America spent billions of dollars on databases and information sharing systems that, unfortunately, were built on outdated technology. At the same time, companies with names like Google, Yahoo, Amazon, eBay, Wikipedia, and YouTube were becoming household names for their ability to quickly sift through enormous amounts of data and deliver the right information to users almost instantly. As a company, we worked to replicate this capability for public safety. We are fueled by the simple and powerful idea that good outcomes for any organization are the result of the good decisions made by its members. Good decisions are made on good information, and in the 21st Century, good information invariably comes from a search engine. Forensic Logic has spent a decade collaborating with local, state and federal law enforcement agencies to deploy its LEAP Network, a search engine created specifically for law enforcement. Fueled by our acquisition of COPLINK, we have combined our powerful search technology with the data from the largest network of agencies across America. We believe that our nation and the law enforcement officers who protect it, deserve nothing less than the right information, in every situation.

Why Fortress Identity Biometric Solutions. Fortress Identity uses the inherent functions of what you HAVE (smartphone) with who you ARE (face, fingerprint, voice) and how you BEHAVE (type, touch, rhythm) to ensure it s really you logging in or making the transaction. The dangers of passwords: From consumers to enterprises, weakness in traditional text-based passwords has caused massive data breaches, identity theft, and fraud. Complex passwords, two-tier authentication, pins and tokens, also have been hacked at every level. The cost associated with passwords: As data breaches are occurring at all levels, IT support costs are rising to protect vulnerabilities in customer applications and sensitive data, employee email accounts, networks and websites. PRODUCTS: WE BRING TECHNOLOGY AND EMOTION TOGETHER THROUGH GREAT ENGINEERING, TEACHING MACHINES TO RECOGNIZE THE BEAUTY OF THE WORLD. FotoNation platforms offer customers the opportunity to bring cutting-edge imaging features to market. Our advantages come from our smart algorithms and super-efficient processing power in constrained systems. We ve done the heavy lifting, making our platforms ready for developers to connect these capabilities in functionally relevant and innovative ways. UNDERSTAND: WE TRAIN MACHINES TO UNDERSTAND THE COMPLEXITY OF THE WORLD. To help you capture great media and keep your data secure. WE BRIDGE THE GAP BETWEEN TECHNOLOGY AND EMOTION. NEAR FIELD GAZE TRACKING: Game changer in relation to visual fidelity, interface design and interactivity in the XR field. FACE CENTRIC ANALYTICS: We teach machines the beauty and the complexity of human faces. 80% of all pictures taken today contain at least one face. Simply put, face analytics are the backbone of computer vision. Technologies surrounding exposure, focus and white balance calibration, biometrics, portrait enhancement or emotion recognition are the bridge from today s computer vision-centric cameras to tomorrow s decision making intelligent cameras. FotoNation offers a hybrid and scalable software/hardware implementation in a flexible architecture to enable intelligent imaging capabilities in any embedded device. This enables the best mix of low-power, high performance and state-of-the-art functionality that delivers outstanding user experiences. Driven by convolutional neural networks (CNN), our face-centric analytics pack contains FDX (next-generation face detection technology), Face Features Detection (FFD), Face Classification (FC) and Emotion Detection. Face Detection & Tracking solution based on a CNN detection engine. Neural network enhanced parametric model for human faces. Demographic-friendly CNN empowered face classification technology. Neural based emotion classification with easy adoption of specific classes. FDX is a novel implementation of a face and facial landmark detector entirely designed to run optimally on mobile platforms. Based on a CNN architecture specifically designed to cover all corner-cases, the system is able to detect faces in an unconstrained environment. FDX employs CNNs designed for multi-task face analytics able to simultaneously detect faces, perform regression for improved face framing, detect facial features (eyes and corners of the mouth) and output the orientation angles. BODY CENTRIC ANALYTICS: The key to environmentally aware intelligent cameras. IRIS RECOGNITION: Always ON government grade biometrics as main driver for never seen before experience. FACESAFE 3D FACE RECOGNITION: Proven neural based technology deployed in the LG G8 ThinQ smartphone. Facial recognition plays a crucial role in our lives. The simple act of recognizing a face is the DNA of social interactions. Empowering devices to recognize faces will help us tap into a huge reservoir of opportunities with the potential of disrupting the way we interact with technology. FaceSafe enables OEMs to go beyond a simple face unlock. By knowing who is using them their devices could make educated decisions thus elevating the user experience. This decision making, for example, could change the way the UI looks or could use personalized photography or videography acquisition and processing. 20 years of experience in computer vision are at the core of FaceSafe. This is powered by FotoNation s convolutional neural network based Face Analytics pack, a solution that includes face detection and tracking, face features detection, face classification and emotion detection. DEPTH AGNOSTIC Face is compatible with structured light and time of flight systems. ANTI-SPOOFING Print attack, replay / video attack and 3D mask. OCCLUSION PROOF A face covered up to 20% is still detected. ATTENTION DETECTION Solution will activate only when the user is looking at the device. In a fully digital world, people need state-of-the-art experiences combined with security and ID protection in the form of contactless biometric solutions. FaceSafe offers rich user experience, security and reliability. FotoNation s FaceSafe can be used to unlock your phone or set up multiple user profiles, each with a different access level, look and feel. It can also be used to offer the first access to a more secure zone, such as a payment zone. The technology translates the visual information from the enrollment process into secured key data and uses that data for verification of each user. The user s face is not stored as a 3D scan or as a picture. FaceSafe offers state-of-the-art anti-spoofing and liveness detection capabilities. A spoofing attack can be translated as an unauthorized attempt to access your device by someone that does not have rights or privileges to do it. The attack can be carried out by using a photo (print attack), a video (replay attack) or a 3D mask of the phone s owner. Anti-spoofing measures demonstrate the face recognition solution s robustness in such an attack. Liveness detection, which includes contextual information analysis, texture analysis, user interaction and depth analysis, all play a role in the anti-spoofing measures. RECOGNIZE: WE TRAIN MACHINES TO RECOGNIZE THEIR USERS AND TAILOR EXPERIENCES. To help you keep your data secure and truly personalize your devices. ENHANCE: WE TRAIN MACHINES TO UNRAVEL THE BEAUTY OF THE WORLD. To capture unique moments with perfect clarity and relive the best memories at the touch of a button. 3D PORTRAIT: Still and video aligned for breathtaking results. AI based 3D relighting paired with background processing. ELECTRONIC IMAGE STABILIZATION: Unique hybrid implementation. Lightning fast image processing. Best-in-class motion estimation. OPTIMIZE: WE UNLOCK THE POWER OF ANY NEURAL PROCESSING UNIT. Image Processing Unit (IPU) is the first realtime AI enabled imaging engine with support for encrypted networks. OBJECT DETECTION ENGINE: Neural centric object detection, tracking and template matching. DISTORTION CORREFCTION ENGINE: Distortion correction and electronic image stabilization with no trade-offs. MARKET: ON THE BRINK OF A NEW ERA. We believe that artificial intelligence and machine learning are the backbone of outstanding experiences. We are looking towards the decision-making devices of tomorrow, whether they be in the palm of your hand, head mounted or on the road. FotoNation is bringing its two decades of experience in enabling continuous learning and adaptability to mobile devices and automotive segment. We strongly believe that the future is not only about machine learning alone. Without the proper ecosystem, machine learning is just a better tool than the one we used before. However, it would still only be a tool. This is why are taking a holistic approach in engineering the next generation of technologies. The first step toward this is edge intelligence, where always ON camera features look at the world and at humans continuously. They understand, recognize and augment to create extraordinary experiences with and for the user. MOBILE: Decision-based devices of tomorrow need a holistic approach and an ecosystem behind them to deliver greatness. The future is about intelligent devices that will be able to understand and make decisions. Our smartphones will be complemented by virtual, augmented or mixed reality devices. Understanding and real time response need to be concurrent and on-the-fly. Machine learning is as good as the process behind it ‚Äì the development, data preparation, testing and validation of the algorithms. For this to happen, we need to achieve high flexibility and configurability after silicon, ultra high performance and unmatched power consumption. XR: Today we can build new worlds and transport the users there. Or we can augment the one we are already in, reshaping and transforming it. As a global leader in computer vision and machine learning, FotoNation holds the key ingredients for XR space experiences. We have the knowledge and the capability to enable super-humans via augmented perception: super vision and super knowledge. AUTOMOTIVE: DISTRACTED DRIVING. ONE IN FIVE FATAL CRASHES INVOLVE DRIVER FATIGUE. IN-CABIN ADVANCED DRIVER ASSISTANCE SYSTEMS (ADAS). 3D FACE MODELING AND EYE TRACKING WITH FULL 180¬∞ COVERAGE. SMART HOME: The homes of tomorrow will be most of all, aware. They will understand their surroundings, they will identify and classify them in real-time and they will be able to personalize the experience of their owners. Awareness is the first true step towards a truly autonomous smart home. Imagine a home that learns, recognizes and adapts to you, for you. Imagine the music following you around, automatically changing the volume when you talk or go to sleep. Imagine the lighting intensity and color changing to complement your mood, while the temperature in every room you walk into changes as the house recognizes you and every member of your family. Imagine the intelligence residing in the home and not in the cloud for answering your privacy and security concerns. For this to happen, we need to enable next-generation, neural-based, real-time execution computer vision technologies. FotoNation s IPU is a collection of high-performance post-silicon configurable IP cores optimized to address image processing tasks that provide  unfair  advantage for high-quality imaging solutions. Computer vision solutions as part of the home environment are more challenging compared with the mobile environment. Home deployment comes with its own set of specifics that need to be addressed concurrently ‚Äì 180¬∞ field of view, visible, mixed and/or NIR cameras, bill of materials control, interior design friendly or low power. All of these in the context where privacy and solutions security are key. IP needs to be protected against theft. FotoNation s IPU s provides computer vision solutions on the edge with full support for encrypted neural networks becomes the foundation of any home intelligent home.
